name: dev-toolbox
title: Developer Toolbox
description: A collection of utils commonly used in daily development.
author: dytes

commands.name: timestamp
commands.title: Timestamp
commands.description: Return the timestamp in seconds since the epoch

commands.name: timestamp-ms
commands.title: Timestamp in Milliseconds
commands.description: Return the timestamp in milliseconds since the epoch

commands.name: local-date
commands.title: Local Date
commands.description: Return local date in ISO8601 format

commands.name: timestamp-to-date
commands.title: Timestamp(second) to Date
commands.description: Convert timestamp in second to date and return in ISO8601 format

commands.name: timestamp-ms-to-date
commands.title: Timestamp(millisecond) to Date
commands.description: Convert timestamp in millisecond to date and return in ISO8601 format

commands.name: uuid
commands.title: Generate UUID
commands.description: Generate UUID and copy to clipboard
